name: Tracker
description:
Esc- quit

WASD- movement

Right click- close text window

This is a bit incomplete. I think it needs some more development to actually be fun to play.

You're a hiker and want to follow animal tracks to spot the animal at the end of the trail. The dialogue box will tell you which animal you need to track next. The paths are poorly maintained so you will have to navigate around the trees. Take too long and the trail will go cold. Take the wrong turn and you will be taken back to the start.
